text: The 1972 Wyoming Cowboys football team represented the University of Wyoming in the 1972 NCAA University Division football season. The Cowboys were led by second-year head coach Fritz Shurmur and played their home games at War Memorial Stadium in Laramie, Wyoming. They finished the season with a 4–7 record overall and a 3–4 record in the Western Athletic Conference to finish 5th in the conference. ==Schedule== ==References== Wyoming Category:Wyoming Cowboys football seasons Category:1972 in Wyoming
title: 1972 Wyoming Cowboys football team
